div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 08:55 am CDT

div.span: Sunny, with a high near 72. North northwest wind 9 to 14 mph increasing to 16 to 21 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 29 mph.
Clear, with a low around 47. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 79. West northwest wind 3 to 6 mph.

h3.a: Congratulations To Our Elementary and Middle School Archery Teams For Making The National Tournament!

div.p:
We are extremelyÂ proud of our NRC students!
Be on the lookout for them and wish them luck as they will be traveling to Louisville, KY to competeÂ May 6th-9th!

h3.a: Domino Grant Recipients: North Rock Creek High School Band

div.p:
Mr. and Mrs. Goodnight accepted the Domino Grant on behalf of the North Rock Creek High School Band.Â The proceeds will goÂ towards purchasing a band trailer to transport instruments to and from away games.
Â
Â
Congratulations!

div.p:
Steak Fingers did not arrive this morning for tomorrow lunch. Therefore, we are moving Thursday's scheduled lunch of Chicken Drumsticks to tomorrow in hopes Steak fingers arrive Wednesday.
Â
